item.title: About Me
item.description: The Robotics Engineer & DevOps Link to heading There are many robotics engineers, but few are Linux DevOps. I am both. No better word describes my passion to building robots. I studied in a robotics master program and develop low- and high-level robot controllers. I now work as an engineer in a robotics startup. Linux DevOps was a by-product from taking control of my digital life. It started with self-hosting Pleroma, a decentralized and open source social media platform.
